duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage clients through identifying their needs with a consultative approach and top beauty brands.
Drive sales through hospitality mentality and upsell products and services.
Demonstrate credibility to the client through product knowledge and inspire clients through demonstrating product application.
Support merchandise operations, inventory management, and visual elements of the shop.
Maintain inventory, pricing, testers, and cleanliness and hygiene standards.
Demonstrate continuous curiosity to learn and expand knowledge in the beauty industry.

education_certification.credential: Authentic passion for beauty, Retail or Service Industry experience
